content:
Hi! I realized I forgot to include one work experience on my resume page titled "Online Resume." Could you please help me add it to the "Work History" section?

The position is "Research Assistant," and it took place from January to August 2023. The description should be: "Assisted in conducting user experience research projects at my bachelor‚Äôs program, supporting data collection, analyzing user feedback, and preparing research reports. Developed strong skills in research methodologies and improved collaboration with interdisciplinary teams."

For the image or logo, please use the one from the "Education" section (my bachelor school) to keep everything consistent.

Also, please make sure that the formatting ‚Äî including font style, size, and layout ‚Äî matches the existing entries in the Work History section so it looks seamless.

Thank you!

Note: Based on your understanding, solve the task all at once by yourself, don't ask for my opinions on anything.

content.text: I'll help you add the Research Assistant position to your Online Resume page. Let me start by finding your resume page and examining its structure.
Now let me retrieve the resume page to examine its content structure:
Let me examine the column list structure to understand the layout better:
Let me check the content of both columns to understand the structure and find the Work History section:
Now let me check the main content column (the right column) to find the Work History section:

content.text: Now let me check the second work experience entry to confirm the pattern:
Let me check the Education section to get the university logo that you mentioned should be used for the Research Assistant position:

Perfect! Now I have all the information I need. I can see the structure:

1. Work History section has a heading, a divider, and then work experiences in column lists
2. Each work experience has:
   - A small column (0.125 width) with a company logo image
   - A large column (0.875 width) with:
     - Position title (bold)
     - Date range (italic, gray color)
     - Description (normal text, gray color)
     - Empty paragraph for spacing

3. The university logo from the Education section should be used for the Research Assistant position.

Now I'll add the new Research Assistant position after the existing work experiences. I need to add it as a new column list after the second work experience but before the Education section.

content.text: The API is requiring the image to be provided as an external URL. Let me fix this by using the external format:

arguments: {"after": "2562b7e8-cebd-813c-a92c-e7bd217d8d10", "block_id": "2562b7e8-cebd-81e4-b88a-f455d8b52248", "children": [{"column_list":{"children":[{"column":{"children":[{"image":{"external":{"url":"https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/99ea616b-a979-41c7-81dd-723df646c9c8/228e2d29-b83a-416d-9489-394624c29e32/imperial-college-london-logo-E7D84B3293-seeklogo.com.png"},"type":"external"},"type":"image"}],"width_ratio":0.125},"type":"column"},{"column":{"children":[{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"annotations":{"bold":true},"text":{"content":"Research Assistant"},"type":"text"}]},"type":"paragraph"},{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"annotations":{"color":"gray","italic":true},"text":{"content":"January - August 2023"},"type":"text"}]},"type":"paragraph"},{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[{"annotations":{"color":"gray"},"text":{"content":"Assisted in conducting user experience research projects at my bachelor's program, supporting data collection, analyzing user feedback, and preparing research reports. Developed strong skills in research methodologies and improved collaboration with interdisciplinary teams."},"type":"text"}]},"type":"paragraph"},{"paragraph":{"rich_text":[]},"type":"paragraph"}],"width_ratio":0.875},"type":"column"}]},"type":"column_list"}]}
name: API-patch-block-children

content.text: Excellent! The Research Assistant position has been successfully added to your Online Resume. Let me verify that it was added correctly by checking the new column list:

Perfect! I have successfully added the Research Assistant position to your Online Resume. Here's what I accomplished:

## ‚úÖ Task Completed Successfully

I've added the Research Assistant work experience to your "Work History" section with the following details:

**Position:** Research Assistant  
**Duration:** January - August 2023  
**Description:** "Assisted in conducting user experience research projects at my bachelor's program, supporting data collection, analyzing user feedback, and preparing research reports. Developed strong skills in research methodologies and improved collaboration with interdisciplinary teams."

### Key Features Implemented:

1. **Consistent Formatting:** The new entry matches the exact format of your existing work experiences:
   - Logo in a small left column (12.5% width)
   - Content in a large right column (87.5% width)
   - Position title in bold text
   - Dates in italic gray text
   - Description in regular gray text
   - Proper spacing with an empty paragraph at the end

2. **Correct Logo:** Used the Imperial College London logo from your Education section, maintaining visual consistency across your resume

3. **Proper Placement:** Added the Research Assistant position as the third work experience in your Work History section, positioned logically between your existing work experiences and the Education section

4. **Professional Formatting:** The entry seamlessly blends with your existing resume design and maintains the professional appearance of your document

The Research Assistant position now appears in your resume with the same professional styling as your other work experiences, providing a complete and cohesive presentation of your work history.
